data.name: Gunsmith Simulator: Prologue
data.detailed_description:
ADD TO WISHLIST

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1101120/Gunsmith_Simulator/
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1982080/Animal_Shelter__Puppies__Kittens_DLC/
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1403850/Mars_Colony_Builder/


About the Game



Start your own workshop and become the greatest gunsmith in town!

“Gunsmith Simulator: Prologue” is a free game that will introduce you to the world of gunsmithing. This is a stand-alone story which includes all the features available in the full version of the “Gunsmith Simulator”. Give it a go – learn how to repair guns and get ready for the work to come!

Your first commission has to be special so that you can prove yourself worthy of the gunsmith title!
Having scrolled down the ads on “GunStock” you finally found it – a request from a middle-aged lady named Helene Buyer. She needed someone to inspect the weapons she’d inherited from her father. Judging by the fancy wrap on her neck, she is quite rich, which means she will pay a lot.
Interested? Accept the commission and move forward!

Helen has just delivered you the weapons and asked really nicely to check them out. So, what are you waiting for? Take a sip of a cold drink and get down to work – solve the mystery of the guns and discover the reason behind the damage!
During the inspection you will have to find out what is wrong with the weapons – is it stovepipe, slamfire, hammer follow or something else? Look at the guns, determine the reason of their malfunction and repair them by fixing up or replacing the faulty elements!

These guns are surely old – it’s time to give them a second life!
Get rid of the rust in the acid bath or by bead blasting. Protect the weapons’ surface from further oxidation and make sure that they don’t look like some museum artefacts. Remember to renew the guns so that they can work as smoothly as the new ones. Do you think you can accomplish that? Let’s find out!

If you’re done with this drab, ordinary look of the guns, then improvise a little and change them to your liking! How about some painting to refresh their appearance?
You have a wide range of accessories to choose from, but remember – more isn’t always better. How about keeping it minimalist or practical? Well, it’s up to you.
Do you think that the owner will recognize the guns?

Now, as the job is finished, let’s try out the refurbished equipment. Shoot some dummies, test the weapons in combat, or simply rest a bit and admire your work. Ask yourself: is everything working properly? If not – don’t give up and give it one more shot!
Anyway, don’t forget that this is about reputation. Whether you will be recommended or not is the matter of the highest priority. Don’t neglect a thing and do your best!

Having repaired the guns you may let the client know that the job is done. Helena Buyer will certainly be grateful for your help with her heirloom. Still, you can only guess if she will put the guns behind the glass, or use them in a shooting range.
Anyway, your job is done here – enjoy this feeling of fulfillment. If you have returned the perfectly repaired weapons, there is nothing to worry about. The word will spread that the best gunsmith has arrived to town.
Yeah, the pressure is real, so keep up the good work and prepare for the next commissions!

We invite you to our server on Discord. Join us:

data.short_description: You have been asked to repair some old guns. Bring the weapons back to their former glory! Gunsmith Simulator: PROLOGUE is a stand-alone game and the introduction to the full version of Gunsmith Simulator.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Traditional Chinese*, Simplified Chinese*, Czech*, Spanish - Latin America*, Japanese*, Korean*, Polish*, Portuguese*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Russian*, Turkish*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 8.1, Windows 10
  • Processor: 3.2GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 660
  • Storage: 11 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible Sound card
